REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes benefits and protections of essential employees providing essential services during a state of emergency
Summary: Establishes benefits and protections for essential employees providing essential services during a state of emergency; defines essential services; requires certain disaster plans to provide measures to provide benefits and protections to employees providing essential services and requires such disaster plans to provide care to students aged 12 and under.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing benefits and protections of essential employees during a state of emergency
